data.comment: The match has started at Opel Arena.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
In the minute 2, Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
Mainz are in shooting range from this free kick.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Mainz.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Mainz.
In the minute 7, Throw-in high up the field for 1. FC Cologne in Mainz.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 8, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Mainz.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 10, 1. FC Cologne needs to be cautious. Mainz have an attacking throw-in.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Free kick Mainz.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1. FC Cologne are whistled for offside.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 16, In Mainz 1. FC Cologne drive forward through Salih Ozcan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
1. FC Cologne advance rapidly upfield but Felix Zwayer blows for offside.
In the minute 18, Mainz's Daniel Brosinski gets in a shot but it is blocked by a 1. FC Cologne defender.
Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for Mainz, close to 1. FC Cologne's area.
Throw-in for Mainz close to the penalty box.
In the minute 19, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 22, Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 25, Mainz's Karim Onisiwo breaks free at Opel Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at Opel Arena.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mainz are caught offside.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Felix Zwayer awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Felix Zwayer awards Mainz a goal kick.
Felix Zwayer signals a Mainz throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 34, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Mainz.
Felix Zwayer awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 35, 1. FC Cologne have a dangerous throw-in.
Mainz are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Mainz will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 37, Moussa Niakhate for Mainz has been booked by Felix Zwayer and receives a first yellow card.
Important block from the Mainz defence as Elvis Rexhbecaj fires in a strike for 1. FC Cologne.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 39, Felix Zwayer signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Mainz's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mainz's Jean-Philippe Mateta misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at Opel Arena.
Mainz to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 44, 1. FC Cologne's Ismail Jakobs gets in a shot on goal at Opel Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at Opel Arena.
In the minute 45, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
The first-half is over at Opel Arena.
In the minute 45, Danny Latza (Mainz) has received a yellow card from Felix Zwayer.
The second-half is underway at Opel Arena.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Mainz.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 51, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Mainz drives forward and Danny Latza gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
1. FC Cologne take a 0-1 lead thanks to Elvis Rexhbecaj.
Ondrej Duda with an assist there.
In the minute 56, Ondrej Duda gets his shot on target but fails to score for 1. FC Cologne.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
1. FC Cologne's Elvis Rexhbecaj goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
Felix Zwayer signals a Mainz throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Danny Latza (Mainz) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Mainz in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
1. FC Cologne make their first substitution with Anthony Modeste replacing Jan Thielmann.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 62, 1. FC Cologne are coming forward and Ondrej Duda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Mainz to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
In the minute 63, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Mainz.
Alexander Hack (Mainz) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Mainz.
At Opel Arena, Karim Onisiwo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 68, The home team have replaced Danny Latza with Kevin Stoger. This is the first substitution made today by Jan Moritz Lichte.
Robin Quaison is replacing Jean-Paul Boetius for the home team.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 69, Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mainz drive upfield and Jonathan Michael Burkardt gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a 1. FC Cologne defender.
Salih Ozcan (1. FC Cologne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 71, Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Marius Wolf for 1. FC Cologne drives towards goal at Opel Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Felix Zwayer awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, 1. FC Cologne's Anthony Modeste gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ondrej Duda is booked for the away team.
Kevin Stoger (Mainz) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 76, Ondrej Duda has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
The home team replace Alexander Hack with Pierre Kunde.
Issah Abass is on a sub for Jonathan Michael Burkardt for Mainz.
In the minute 78, Felix Zwayer awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 81, In Mainz Mainz drive forward through Robin Quaison. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
1. FC Cologne's Jannes Horn has been booked in Mainz.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Markus Gisdol (1. FC Cologne) is making a second substitution, with Noah Katterbach replacing Ismail Jakobs.
Dominick Drexler is replacing Elvis Rexhbecaj for the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, Mainz to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
1. FC Cologne needs to be cautious. Mainz have an attacking throw-in.
Mainz's Edimilson Fernandes gets in a shot on goal at Opel Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at Opel Arena.
Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for Mainz, close to 1. FC Cologne's area.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at Opel Arena.
In the minute 89, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In Mainz Mainz attack through Robin Quaison. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
Felix Zwayer will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Robin Quaison (Mainz) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Karim Onisiwo (Mainz) strikes at Opel Arena but his header is cleared.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Robin Zentner (Mainz) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Mainz surge into the attack at Opel Arena but Robin Zentnerâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
The away team replace Salih Ozcan with Benno Erik Schmitz.
